about_the_game:
Become the king of Rockay City in style with this unique bundle!

This DLC includes the following content:

• Baker's Sunday Suit*
• Baker’s Repeater weapon skin*
• Bearslayer weapon skin*

*The Sunday Suit and weapon skins are in-game cosmetics only and available in single-player and multiplayer game modes (if Baker is available).
